ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:0.5_0: The second training rule on disciples
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.2_0: At that time the nun Thullanandā gave the full admission to her disciples, but then neither takes her away nor had her taken away.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.3_0: And so her husband got hold of her.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.4_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.5_0: “How could Venerable Thullanandā give the full admission to a disciple, and then neither take her away nor have her taken away?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.6_0: If this nun had gone away, her husband would not have gotten hold of her.” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.7_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā didn’t do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.10_0: “... How could the nun Thullanandā not do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.11_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.12_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:1.13.1_0: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to her disciple, and then neither takes her away nor has her taken away, even if just 65 to 80 kilometers, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.1.6_0: a student is what is meant.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.1.10_0: she does not herself take her away.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.1.13_0: If she thinks, “I won’t take her away nor have her taken away, even just 65 to 80 kilometers,” then by the mere fact of giving up her duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.2.3_0: if she searches for a companion nun, but is unable to find one;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.2.5_0: They burn in times of trouble,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.2.7_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.2.8_0: The tenth rule, the training rule on tenth rule, is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.2.9_0: The seventh sub-chapter on pregnant women is finished.
